title: Seoul Mourns Victims of Deadly Halloween Crowd Surge
description: People in the Itaewon neighborhood of Seoul poured drinks and left flowers to grieve those killed when a Halloween celebration turned into a crowd crush.
dc:creator: Reuters and Associated Press

media:content.media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Lee Dong-yoon, 21, drank to the memory of those who died in Itaewon on Saturday night.
